title: mailman.start
body:
<<if $spoken_to_mailman == 0>>
    CLAUDE: Hey, I'm pretty busy TRYING to do my job. 
    CLAUDE: I'd love if I could just get a day off. 
    CLAUDE: Between you and me, this job freaking stinks!
    CLAUDE: My boss has been on my butt all day, and it already has a rash.
[[Here's some fresh butt creme! |mailman.choice1]]
[[Get yo nasty butt outta here! |mailman.choice2]]
    <<set $spoken_to_mailman to 1>>
<<endif>>
<<if $jock_started_quest == 1>>
    <<if $jock_ended_quest == 0>>
        CLAUDE: I was going to keep this for myself.
        CLAUDE: I just hate listing things on GregsList.
        CLAUDE: Don't tell me what it was or I'll get jealous. 
    <<endif>>
    <<set $jock_ended_quest to 1>>
<<endif>>
<<if $mailman_talked_to_today is 1>>
    CLAUDE: This mail isn't going to deliver itself. Wish it did though. 
    <<stop>>
<<else>>
    <<if $mailman_day is 0>>
        CLAUDE: Nice to see you again. This creme is working it's magic.
        CLAUDE: Okay, so you want to be a member of the Citizens Delivery Union?
        CLAUDE: They have realllllly good benefits. Mailmans promise. 
        CLAUDE: And no you can't do a mailmans promise until you join.
        [[ I want to be a part of your secret club! |mailman.choice3]]
        [[ That sounds super lame. Who would want to be a mailman? |mailman.choice4]]
        
    <<elseif $mailman_day is 1>>
        CLAUDE: Welcome back mailman in training. Or mail...house? 
        CLAUDE: Today you have your hardest task ahead of you. 
        CLAUDE: You must.
        CLAUDE: DELIVER 
        CLAUDE: A
        CLAUDE: LETTER!!
        CLAUDE: NOW GET TO IT MAIL BOY! 
        [[ YES POSTMASTER! I won't let you down! |mailman.choice5]]
         DELIVER LETTER TO MAILBOX
        [[ I really am not feeling this at all. |mailman.choice6]]
       
    <<elseif $mailman_day is 2>>
        CLAUDE: You've proven that you can work hard.
        CLAUDE: I'll be sure to tell the higher ups about you.
        CLAUDE: My recommendation is of the highest regard. 
        CLAUDE: BUT! I have one more request. I need you to drop this off.
        CLAUDE: It's my two week notice. But I stuck a raw fish in the envelope.
        CLAUDE: It's gonna stink to high heaven. I've waited 3 long months for this.
        CLAUDE: My job is yours now. 
    <<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: mailman.choice1
body:
CLAUDE: Heck yes my dude, thank you for the butt creme. 
CLAUDE: This is going to make running around in these tight pants a non-issue.
CLAUDE: I find some pretty cool things in the mail, I might have something for you tomorrow.
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>
<<addlove CurrentTarget>>

title: mailman.choice3
body:
CLAUDE: W-What? 
CLAUDE: THAT'S PERFECT!
CLAUDE: I mean that's great. Awesome.
CLAUDE: Listen kid, I'll teach you everything. 
CLAUDE: The mailmans code of honor. How to put a letter in a mailbox.
CLAUDE: Everythiiiiiing. But not today of course. There's far too much to cover.
CLAUDE: Come back tomorrow for mailman boot camp. 
<<addlove CurrentTarget>>
<<set $mailman_day to 1>>
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.choice2
body:
CLAUDE: DUDE!! 
CLAUDE: I thought I might be able to take you under my wing.
CLAUDE: Guess my mailmans intuition is way off. Bummer. 
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.choice4
body:
CLAUDE: OUTTA MY FACE BUCKO! 
CLAUDE: NOBODY THINKS POSTAL WORKERS ARE UNCOOL!
CLAUDE: WHO DO YOU EVEN THINK YOU AREEEE!?
CLAUDE: I got real work to do. LATER!
<<set $mailman_accept_quest to 1>>
<<set $mailman_done_quest to 1>>

title: mailman.choice5
body:
CLAUDE: LOOK AT YOU! 
CLAUDE: You put that letter in the mailbox like a freakin champ.
CLAUDE: I've never seen such amazing work from a rookie.
CLAUDE: If I had to be picky I would say make sure the stamp is on it next time.
CLAUDE: I took it off before giving it too you. 
CLAUDE: Guess I'll have to keep whatevers inside. Birthday money from grandma hopefully.
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>
<<addlove CurrentTarget>>

title: mailman.choice6
body:
CLAUDE: Ooof that really hurts my poor little heart. 
CLAUDE: This has not been a good day for me or my feelings.
CLAUDE: Maybe opening a few of these letters will cheer me up. 
CLAUDE: Yeah. You don't need to talk to any mean houses today. 
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.askinside
body:
LAMMY: really, GIRL?
LAMMY: but where will i play?
[[by the bridge|mailman.playbybridge]][[come inside|mailman.comeinside]]

title: mailman.playbybridge
body:
LAMMY: that rickety old thing?
LAMMY: nobody wants to go on that thing
LAMMY: maybe one day i'll find a place to play
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.comeinside
body:
LAMMY: GIRL, YEAH
LAMMY: we'll have a rockin' house party!
LAMMY: i want to party with you forever
<<set $mailman_acquired to 1>>
<<addlove CurrentTarget>>
